entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of light snow beginning early this afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 early this morning. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 42 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near midnight then mainly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 late this evening. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023
